[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/language-AppleScript-blue.svg?longCache=True)]()

#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install mac-wallpaper
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`wallpaper` |`usage: wallpaper [path]`

#### Examples
```bash
$ wallpaper path/to/wallpaper.jpg
$ wallpaper
path/to/wallpaper.jpg
```
